content.rendered:
Université de Saint-Boniface Admission Requirements, Standard English Test Requirements, list Of Programs Available, how to apply for admission.

Université de Saint-Boniface Admission is ongoing for all students who are interested in applying; the admission is open for both indigenous and international students:

Université de Saint-Boniface Admission Requirements

The admission fees must accompany your application form and they must be paid by one of the payments methods (French only) accept by USB.

Your application will not be processed until the admission fees have been received with the payments note that all payments made are non-refundable.

Standard English Test Requirements

To access the English requirements:

  • Please click here.

Choose a program you are interested in here

How to Apply

  • Check the deadlines
  • Check your program
  • Determine your status
  • Fill out your application form here
  • Submit your documents

To view, the specific program requirements visit https://ustboniface.ca/file/exigences-dadmission-des-programmes.pdf

Application Deadline:

Bachelor of Social Work

Profile ………….. April 1
Letter of Recommendation…….April 1
Curriculum vitae……………….. April 1
Admissions Interview………..Third Monday in April
Official Transcript…………. August 22

ongoing Education

Please note that before you apply for admission you must know to speak and write French
